title: Slight game delay?
body:
So i know this has been discussed before, ive been doing some research but havent found much help. I notice my first game is usually fine but as I continue to play, I start to develope a slight click delay, its a really tiny delay but its enough to throw off abilities, last hits and can be annoying in team fights especially as adc, which I play a lot haha. Ive noticed my abilities and wards are even unpredictable at times as to when they are going to cast. Along with this I notice that the announcer is delayed as well, with the an enemy has been killed etc call outs. Not sure if anyone else still experiences this as the last post ive seen was last year. Id like to think its not my pc as its a decently high end pc.

My specs

Intel I5- 2500K @ 3.30GHz
16gigs of ddr3 Ram
Geforce gtx 960 4gigs dedicated
Im running on a wireless card but im getting 150mbs
and the signal strength is almost full bars(minus 1 bar)

Any help would be appreciated

replies.body: Input delays like this can be due to packet loss and not necessarily a hardware issue.  Running on wireless could be a culprit though,  and using a wired connection to troubleshoot would be a solid first step.  I would recommend running a[ Log Reader ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader)which can help find what's going wrong, as well as provide some steps towards a resolution.  I hope it helps!
